key_risks: Economic Sensitivity: Vulnerability to economic downturns and housing affordability challenges
Interest Rate Risk: Rising interest rates could increase borrowing costs
Regulatory Risks: Potential changes in housing regulations
Market Competition: High competition from other REITs and private investors
Tenant Disputes: Complaints related to rent increases and maintenance issues
controversies: BBB Complaints: Tenant disputes and property management issues
Tenant Disputes: Occasional complaints about rent increases and lease terms
environmental_issues: Sustainability Initiatives: Energy-efficient upgrades and sustainable practices
social_issues: Tenant Relations: Complaints and disputes affecting tenant satisfaction
governance_issues: Leadership Changes: Recent executive appointments to drive growth and operational improvements
